subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Dow Jones Receives $5 Billion Buy Offer
body:
Dow Jones & Co., publisher of The Wall Street Journal, confirms that it 
received a bid from News Corp. to buy the company for about $5 billion , or 
$60 a share.



Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
